author: Mike Kelly
title: Now Brexit is official it's time to back the North East people who supported it
text:
News Opinion Now Brexit is official it's time to back the North East people who supported it Report last week talks of worse inequality than the Thatcher years when the North was the hardest hit Share News Opinion MPs in the House of Commons, London, as legislation to allow Theresa May to start formal Brexit talks has cleared its first Commons hurdle after MPs gave it a second reading by 498 votes to 114 - a majority of 384 (Photo: PA) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Now the Brexit pantomime has been sorted out with the vote in Parliament and the High Court blocking another legal challenge, can the government and the opposition parties get round to dealing with something I would suggest is rather more pressing. 
In short, the ever growing inequality that exists in this country. 
Since last June the whole country has been obsessed with the question of should we stay or should we get out of Europe. 
This despite the fact that the public voted 52% to 48% in favour of Brexit on June 23 so it was a done deal. A man walks towards the underground in front of the Houses of Parliament (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
So let’s move on, although this is not to criticise those who voted against triggering article 50 as they have qualms about a Brexit blank cheque for May. There still has to be scrutiny of the process. 
While there are deep divisions over the EU I can’t imagine there’s anything other than common ground between the vast majority of the UK about the issue of inequality. 
A leading thinktank warned last week that falling living standards for the poor threatened the biggest rise in inequality since Margaret Thatcher was prime minister. Margaret Thatcher (Photo: PA) 
During the Thatcher years , traditional industries were ground to dust, communities crushed, unemployment rocketed and unions were emasculated so protection of ordinary workers was drastically reduced. 
Meanwhile the considerable wealth this country generated from that time to this was redirected to an ever more exclusive club - the true elite we should be having a go at. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
